content:
EXISTING STRUCTURES

### Coal Mining Complex at position(x=37-41, y=-83 to -87)
Consists of:
- 4 Burner mining drills positioned at (41.0,-86.0), (37.0,-85.0), (39.0,-85.0), (41.0,-83.0)
- Collection chests at (40.5,-87.5), (36.5,-86.5), (39.5,-83.5)
- Burner inserters at (35.5,-86.5), (35.5,-85.5) for coal transport
All drills are currently out of fuel but positioned over coal resources

### Iron/Copper Ore Mining at position(x=-28, y=-61)
Consists of:
- Burner mining drill at (-28.0,-61.0) positioned over iron and copper ore
- Wooden chest at (-27.5,-59.5) for ore collection
- Burner inserter at (-26.5,-59.5) for ore transport
- Stone furnace at (-27.0,-58.0) for smelting
- Output chest at (-24.5,-58.5) for plates

### Iron Ore Mining Complex at position(x=-6 to -10, y=-59)
Consists of:
- 3 Burner mining drills at (-10.0,-59.0), (-8.0,-59.0), (-6.0,-59.0)
- Collection chests at (-9.5,-57.5), (-7.5,-57.5), (-5.5,-57.5)
- Transport belt system connecting the mining area
All drills currently out of fuel but positioned over iron ore

### Smelting Array at position(x=0 to 6, y=0)
Consists of:
- 4 Stone furnaces at (0.0,0.0), (2.0,0.0), (4.0,0.0), (6.0,0.0)
- Input inserters and chests system at y=-2.5
- Output inserters and chests system at y=2.5
- Transport belt network connecting components

### Power Generation System at position(x=-3.5 to 4.5, y=20-27)
Consists of:
- Offshore pump at (-3.5,27.5)
- Boiler at (-1.5,22.0)
- Steam engine at (4.5,20.5)
- Pipe network connecting water flow
- Small electric pole network for power distribution

ERROR TIPS

### Fuel Management Issues
- Ensure mining drills and inserters have fuel before operation
- Set up automated coal delivery system to keep machines running

### Entity Placement and Connection Issues
- Connect fluid-carrying entities (pipes, boilers, steam engines) properly to ensure water/steam flow
- Ensure transport belts form complete paths between source and destination

### Resource Management
- Empty full chests regularly to prevent production blockages (chest at -5.5,-55.5 is full)
- Set up longer transport belt lines to move resources between distant facilities

### Crafting System Issues
- Ensure all required ingredients are available before attempting to craft items
- Handle nil value errors by proper error checking in crafting functions
